start:
Hi! 🖐
Welcome to the kingdom of knowledge. What are we going to do this modest evening?
quotes_menu:
🧸
 I will just leave him there.
So... don't feel lonely 🙂️

Do you also know how to draw an owl?
  🦉 = ⭕ + ⭕ + ✨
"Follow your own path, no matter what people say."
The only way to make your life full is never stop dreaming 🪂

quoting.no_quotes:

Come back later, I'm already trying to fix everything
